title: In case of rehabilitation/composite buildings having height more than 70 m, at least one side other than road side, shall have clear open space of 9 m at ground level, accessible from road side
clause_text: In case of rehabilitation/composite buildings having height more than 70 m, at least one side other than road side, shall have clear open space of 9 m at ground level, accessible from road side.
